data.title: Kristen Hurst - Women's Volleyball
data.meta_description: Kristen Hurst (12) Right Side Hitter  - AT USD: Hurst is a four-year volleyball letter winner, becoming one of the best all-around volleyball players in school history...
data.text:
AT USD: Hurst is a four-year volleyball letter winner, becoming one of the best all-around volleyball players in school history... Entering her senior season Hurst had twice been named an All-WCC player and ranked among the Toreros[apos] all-time leaders in both digs and service aces.

HIGH SCHOOL: Attended Stockdale High School in Bakersfield, California... Named Best Female Athlete at Stockdale as a senior... Lettered in basketball, softball and volleyball... Led Stockdale to numerous Southwest Yosemite League basketball championships... Was a three-time First Team All-Southwest Yosemite League selection as a prep basketball player and earned All-Area honors twice... Garnered All-Tournament and Tournament MVP honors during her senior season... Coached by Glenn Hager as a prep.
